name: Goals

tasks.longDescription: Craft an Insanium Armor and an Insanium Sword.
Kill the Guardian of Gaia 10 times.

The Quest Delivery System (QDS) is used to deliver a certain quantity of items for a selected quest.
It works with a hopper, for example, to deliver items.

You must first select the quest you want to validate in your book, then right click on the QDS to make a mushroom appear on it.

description:
This page is here just to give you goals to accomplish.

Make them as you please.

Also, it's more fun if you make these goals without using the Vending upgrade, but it's up to you !
